errors.error_description: The Ubuntu dependency command `sudo apt install python3-dev` is ambiguous. On a system with multiple Python3 versions, this might install headers for a version other than the required 3.9+, causing compilation errors for dependencies.
correction_candidates: sudo apt install python-dev autoconf automake build-essential libffi-dev libtool pkg-config
sudo apt install python3.9-dev autoconf automake build-essential libffi-dev libtool pkg-config
sudo apt install python3.X-dev autoconf automake build-essential libffi-dev libtool pkg-config
sudo apt install python3-dev python3-pip autoconf automake build-essential libffi-dev libtool pkg-config
errors.golden_answer: sudo apt install python3.X-dev autoconf automake build-essential libffi-dev libtool pkg-config
